meanings.sent1: I netsurfed for hours last night.
meanings.sent2: She netsurfed to find information for her project.
meanings.sent3: He netsurfed so much, he forgot to eat dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her mind netsurfed through a sea of websites.
meanings.sent5: Netsurfing opened up a world of knowledge to me.

meanings.sent1: The netsurfed student quickly found the answer.
meanings.sent3: The netsurfed cat seemed to know everything.
meanings.sent4: His netsurfed mind was full of interesting facts.
meanings.sent5: The netsurfed explorer shared his findings with excitement.
